Text: NSIS? What is that? I've heard of NTSC but not NSIS.
@425paul - NSIS = NullSoftInstallSystem a freeware Installer made by the folks who created WinAmp

Using this on Windows 7 64bit. It works perfectly.

Tho there is no Nero vision or anything else than Nero Burning Rom.

The program version is 10.2.11000.12.100

No need to register, no need to disconnect from the internet, no need for serial nor activation.

Be aware that you cannot make DVD-video from .avi, .mpg, .mp4 or any other types with this program.

Thanks for this release XxFukenGruvenxX. :-)
Mine is another Windows 7 x64 platform that it works very well on.  Yes, it doesn't include the extra programs, but the functionality and small footprint are well worth it.  Thank you.
got a question..how can you burn an .iso to a usb flash drive with this program?
